item.description: 'The Witcher' returns to Netflix with a new Geralt of Rivia in a mixed fourth season.

item.title: AI Is Learning To Fight Fires — But Can We Trust It With The Flames?
item.description: Can AI stop the next wildfire before it spreads? New technology aims to fight fires faster than humans ever could.

item.title: Why And How Modern Chip Design Is Automated
item.description: AI-driven semiconductor design eclipses human understanding, reshaping workflows into full-stack, automated, hardware-software “layer-cake” systems.
